News.Title: KSR Footwear clarifies share price movement
News.Summary: KSR Footwear Limited responds to BSE inquiry about significant equity share price movement, stating no undisclosed material information and attributing movement to market forces.

News.Title: KSR Footwear Gets INDBB-/Stable Credit Rating
News.Summary: India Ratings assigns INDBB-/Stable/INDA4 rating to KSR Footwear Limited's ₹320 million bank loan facilities from Union Bank of India, comprising working capital limits.

News.Title: KSR Footwear Reports Rs 91.51 Million Loss in Q2 FY26, Shifts Registered Office to Factory Location
News.Summary: KSR Footwear Limited reported a net loss of Rs 91.51 million for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, compared to Rs 5.33 million loss in the same period last year, with revenue declining to Rs 424.30 million from Rs 506.87 million. The company's board also approved shifting its registered office from Kolkata's Bangur Avenue to its Panpur factory location in West Bengal, effective December 10, 2025.
